Package me.scolastico.tools.web

Class WebServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.scolastico.tools.web.WebServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpHandler
    public class WebServer
extends Object
implements HttpHandler
    An simple webserver for easy management of your api's.

      static void removeUsageWeight​(String ip, int usageWeight)
      To remove a certain value of weight from a user.
      static void setCheckForIndexHtml​(boolean checkForIndexHtml)
      Should if an file override or an resource is found with the name index.html it also replace the "/" url?
      static void setCheckOverrideFolderFirst​(boolean checkOverrideFolderFirst)
      Should the override folder checked first if an file is existing? The http request method will be ignored in this case! If set to true the webserver will check before checking if an website interface will be executed! If something is found the interface will not be called and after sending the content of the file the webserver closes the connection!
      static void setCheckResourcesAfter​(boolean checkResourcesAfter)
      Should the resource folder be checked first if an file is existing? The http request method will NOT be ignored in this case! Only GET will not return in 404! If set to true the webserver will check after checking if an website interface can be executed! If something is found the the webserver will not return a 404 error and will send instead the content of the resource.
      static void setMaxUsageWeight​(int maxUsageWeight)
      Set the max usage weight.
      static void setOverrideFolderPath​(String overrideFolderPath)
      The path to the override folder which should be checked before an request will be handled by the interfaces.
      static void setResourceFolderPath​(String resourceFolderPath)
      The path to the folder in the resources which should be checked after an request was handled by the interfaces.
      static void setWeightLessPerSecond​(int weightLessPerSecond)
      Set how much usage weight an user loses each second.
      static void start​(Integer port)
      Start the webserver.
      static void stop()
      Stop the webserver and reset all registrations.

    • Method Detail

      • setCheckForIndexHtml

        public static void setCheckForIndexHtml​(boolean checkForIndexHtml)
        Should if an file override or an resource is found with the name index.html it also replace the "/" url?
        Parameters:
        checkForIndexHtml - Boolean if it should check for an index file.

      • setCheckOverrideFolderFirst

        public static void setCheckOverrideFolderFirst​(boolean checkOverrideFolderFirst)
        Should the override folder checked first if an file is existing? The http request method will be ignored in this case! If set to true the webserver will check before checking if an website interface will be executed! If something is found the interface will not be called and after sending the content of the file the webserver closes the connection!
        Parameters:
        checkOverrideFolderFirst - Boolean if the webserver should check before handling the request if an override file is existing.

      • setCheckResourcesAfter

        public static void setCheckResourcesAfter​(boolean checkResourcesAfter)
        Should the resource folder be checked first if an file is existing? The http request method will NOT be ignored in this case! Only GET will not return in 404! If set to true the webserver will check after checking if an website interface can be executed! If something is found the the webserver will not return a 404 error and will send instead the content of the resource.
        Parameters:
        checkResourcesAfter - Boolean if the webserver should check after handling the request if an default file exists.

      • setResourceFolderPath

        public static void setResourceFolderPath​(String resourceFolderPath)
        The path to the folder in the resources which should be checked after an request was handled by the interfaces.
        Parameters:
        resourceFolderPath - The path to the folder. Default is "/webserver".

      • setOverrideFolderPath

        public static void setOverrideFolderPath​(String overrideFolderPath)
        The path to the override folder which should be checked before an request will be handled by the interfaces.
        Parameters:
        overrideFolderPath - The path to the folder. Default is "./web".

      • getUsageWeight

        public static int getUsageWeight​(String ip)
        Get the usage weight of an user.
        Parameters:
        ip - The ip of the user.
        Returns:
        The current weight of the user.

      • removeUsageWeight

        public static void removeUsageWeight​(String ip,
                                     int usageWeight)
        To remove a certain value of weight from a user.
        Parameters:
        ip - The ip of the user.
        usageWeight - How much usage weight should be removed?

      • addUsageWeight

        public static void addUsageWeight​(String ip,
                                  int usageWeight)
        To add a certain value of weight from a user.
        Parameters:
        ip - The ip of the user.
        usageWeight - How much usage weight should be added?

      • setMaxUsageWeight

        public static void setMaxUsageWeight​(int maxUsageWeight)
        Set the max usage weight. If an user try's to open a site with more weight than 0 and his weight is over this value the SpecialSite LIMIT_REACHED_PAGE will be shown!
        Parameters:
        maxUsageWeight - The max usage weight.

      • setWeightLessPerSecond

        public static void setWeightLessPerSecond​(int weightLessPerSecond)
        Set how much usage weight an user loses each second.
        Parameters:
        weightLessPerSecond - How much weight should a user lose every second.

      • start

        public static void start​(Integer port)
                  throws IOException
        Start the webserver.
        Parameters:
        port - Port to which the webserver will listen on.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the server cannot start an IOException is thrown.

      • stop

        public static void stop()
        Stop the webserver and reset all registrations.

      • registerAllWebInterfacesInPackage

        public static void registerAllWebInterfacesInPackage​(String packageName)
                                              throws WebServerRegistrationException
        Register all webinterfaces in a package through reflections.
        Parameters:
        packageName - The package name/path as a string. Example: "me.scolastico.tools"
        Throws:
        WebServerRegistrationException - Throws WebserverRegistrationException if the registration fails.

      • registerWebInterface

        public static void registerWebInterface​(AdvancedWebsiteInterface websiteInterface)
                                 throws WebServerRegistrationException
        If you want to register a single webinterface you can register it with this function.
        Parameters:
        websiteInterface - The website interface you want to register.
        Throws:
        WebServerRegistrationException - Throws WebserverRegistrationException if the registration fails.

      • registerWebInterface

        public static void registerWebInterface​(SimpleWebsiteInterface websiteInterface)
                                 throws WebServerRegistrationException
        If you want to register a single webinterface you can register it with this function.
        Parameters:
        websiteInterface - The website interface you want to register.
        Throws:
        WebServerRegistrationException - Throws WebserverRegistrationException if the registration fails.

      • isRunning

        public static boolean isRunning()
        Check if the webserver is running.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the webserver is running.

      • registerWebServerPreExecuter

        public static void registerWebServerPreExecuter​(WebServerPreExecuterInterface preExec)
        Register an pre executer which will be executed every time before the request is processed. If it returns false the handler stops handling the request and will return.
        Parameters:
        preExec - The executer to be registered.

            throws IOException
        Specified by:
        handle in interface HttpHandler
        Throws:
        IOException
